channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources

item.title: BiDi Swap: The bidirectional text trick that makes fake URLs look real
item.description: Attackers are abusing bidirectional text to make fake URLs look real, reviving a decade-old browser flaw now fueling new phishing tricks. Varonis reveals how the "BiDi Swap" technique works and what o...
